appDescription.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.
appDescription.message: Tumia ubaonakili wako kwenye Office Online ili uweze kukata, kunakili, na kubandika kutoka kwenye menyu ya kubofya mara mbili na upau wa riboni.
